name: American Angst (Steam Deluxe Edition)
description: Imagine a horror novel where you get to make the choices and decide how the story plays out: Welcome to American Angst, a text-based multiple-choice survival horror interactive fiction, combining RPG elements and turn-based combat with dark humor and biting satire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or later Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 260 MB available space
